name: 6.6 "Paint Your Office" Trivia Game | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Carla say she felt like?
questions.correct: She had a dump truck parked on her bladder.
options: She had two watermelons stuck inside her.
questions.explanation:
She had a dump truck parked on her bladder.

	Carla was pregnant with the twins still and as the pregnancy progressed she felt worse. Carla was not the glowing woman you hear about when pregnant.

questions.text: Why was Norm cut off from his beer?
questions.correct: He was $837 over his credit limit.
options: His tab was so big they ran out of room for it.
questions.explanation:
He was $837 over his credit limit.

	Norm had never paid on his bar tab and drank a lot so he was in some serious debt. He was cut off which was torture for him.

questions.text: Who did the books for the corporation?
questions.explanation:
Franklin, Sussman and Gurwitz.

	It was suggested that perhaps Norm could do the accounting for the bar but Rebecca said no. The others laughed when it was said he was a good worker.

questions.text: Who repainted the office for Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm was an accountant by profession, but it turned out he was a very good painter as well. And though he denied it, he enjoyed painting a lot.

questions.text: Who told Norm how good beer was?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody dumped out some beer that was not drunk by anyone in front of Norm. Then he told him he had a beer earlier that day when changing the taps. He went on and on about how good it was.

questions.text: Why did Rebecca need Norm's help?
questions.correct: Her hair was stuck to the wall.
options: Her hair was caught in the desk.
questions.explanation:
Her hair was stuck to the wall.

	Rebecca had just gotten off the phone with Evan Drake and was upset. She was leaning against a freshly painted wall and her hair got stuck. When she told Norm she needed his help, he thought she met by giving her hope until she replied, "No you idiot, my hair's stuck to the wall."

questions.text: Who thought Norm was a weenie?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Norm told this to Rebecca and she said, "From what I can tell he's an expert." Cliff left an impression on everyone he met, it seemed.

questions.text: Who bought Norm a beer on the house?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca was impressed with how hard Norm had been working to paint the office, so she gave him a beer on the house. The others were amazed that Norm broke through that tough exterior Rebecca always displayed.

San Diego, California.

	Sam went with Norm to Rebecca's house to paint. When Norm left, they started to get to know each other a little better and one of the questions Sam asked her was where she was from.

questions.text: What branch of the service was Rebecca's father in?
questions.explanation:
Navy.

	Rebecca was telling Sam about her family and mentioned that her Dad was in the Navy. She also mentioned she had a sister who she wasn't too fond of because her sister was so much better than her.
